Layer.onTransitionCompleted

機能/意味
Transition ended
タイプ
Layerクラスのイベント
構文
onTransitionCompleted(dest, src)
引数
dest 　The layer object to transition to (usually this) is passed.
src 　The source layer object of the transition is passed.
　Can be null for some transition types.
説明
　Called when the transition ends.
